content.subject: R: ORDER N°71
content.body_text:
Kind reminder

 

Da: info@mimii-lab.it <info@mimii-lab.it> 
Inviato: giovedì 18 settembre 2025 11:35
A: 'Saad El Ouaamari | SDS' <sa.el@sds-print.com>; 'm.kaddouri@sds-print.com' <m.kaddouri@sds-print.com>
Cc: 'order@sds-print.com' <order@sds-print.com>
Oggetto: R: ORDER N°71
Priorità: Alta

 

Dear Mr Saad,

please find attached the replacement order n°85.

As mentioned on the order, item 2 is very urgent.

 

We look forward to your reply and confirmation.

 

Best regards,

Laura

 

Da: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it>  <info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> > 
Inviato: giovedì 18 settembre 2025 10:04
A: 'Saad El Ouaamari | SDS' <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> >; 'm.kaddouri@sds-print.com' <m.kaddouri@sds-print.com <mailto:m.kaddouri@sds-print.com> >
Cc: 'order@sds-print.com' <order@sds-print.com <mailto:order@sds-print.com> >
Oggetto: R: ORDER N°71
Priorità: Alta

 

Good morning, 

as mentioned in our previous emails we haven’t received items 3 and 4 of our order n°71 although you mentioned they were shipped. Could you please check with the courier? 

Otherwise, we will need them to be produced again urgently.

 

We wait for you quickest reply.

 

Best regards,

Laura

 

 

 

 

Da: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it>  <info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> > 
Inviato: mercoledì 17 settembre 2025 12:20
A: 'Saad El Ouaamari | SDS' <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> >; 'm.kaddouri@sds-print.com' <m.kaddouri@sds-print.com <mailto:m.kaddouri@sds-print.com> >
Oggetto: R: ORDER N°71
Priorità: Alta

 

Kind reminder

 

Da: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it>  <info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> > 
Inviato: lunedì 15 settembre 2025 14:41
A: 'Saad El Ouaamari | SDS' <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> >; 'm.kaddouri@sds-print.com' <m.kaddouri@sds-print.com <mailto:m.kaddouri@sds-print.com> >
Oggetto: R: ORDER N°71

 

Good afternoon,

thank you for the reply.

 

Unfortunately, we haven’t received the material sent. Please contact the courier to check and send us an update.

 

Thank you and best regards,

Laura

 

Da: Saad El Ouaamari | SDS <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> > 
Inviato: lunedì 15 settembre 2025 12:43
A: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> ; m.kaddouri@sds-print.com <mailto:m.kaddouri@sds-print.com> 
Oggetto: AW: ORDER N°71

 

Hallo zusammen,

 

bei der Order 71 haben wir Position 3 und 4 schon im August versendet.

 

Die Muster aus Position 1 und 2 sind für diese Woche geplant, da gab es eine Verzögerung, da wir sehr viel Verschnitt bei diesen Mustern haben. Wir informieren euch im Laufe der Woche, sobald die Muster fertig sind.

 

 

 

 <mailto:m.kaddouri@sds-print.com> @m.kaddouri@sds-print.com bitte mit Georg sprechen, dass diese Muster diese Woche noch gefertigt und versendet werden sollen, danke.

 

Mit freundlichen Grüßen / Kind regards

 

Saad El Ouaamari

Drucktechnischer Berater / Print Technical Consultant

 

SDS Print Services GmbH
Kruppstr. 122
D-60388 Frankfurt


Tel:   +49 (0) 69 4080 29 7-5
Mobil/WhatsApp: +49 (0) 176 873 04 236

 

Von: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it>  <info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> > 
Gesendet: Freitag, 12. September 2025 16:40
An: 'Saad El Ouaamari | SDS' <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> >
Cc: order@sds-print.com <mailto:order@sds-print.com> 
Betreff: I: ORDER N°71
Priorität: Hoch

 

Dear Mr Saad,

we have never received the material from order n°71.

Could you please check and let us know?

Were they shipped? Do you have a tracking number?

 

We look forward to your reply.

Best regards,

Laura

 

 

Da: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it>  <info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> > 
Inviato: venerdì 1 agosto 2025 16:17
A: 'Saad El Ouaamari | SDS' <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> >
Oggetto: R: ORDER N°71

 

Dear Mr Saad,

thank you for your email.

 

I will send you an offer request for new models from now on, just to make sure we have the right price.

 

Please find attached the revised order n°71.

We also added another item for which we already had a quote, please check.

 

We wait for your order confirmation and delivery date.

 

Thank you.

 

Best regards,

Laura

 

Da: Saad El Ouaamari | SDS <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> > 
Inviato: venerdì 1 agosto 2025 11:01
A: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> 
Oggetto: AW: ORDER N°71

 

Dear Laura,

 

thank you for your order n°71. But we need clarification:

 

we can not offer these prices. Please inquire the prices in future for each item, as the price of 0.40€/piece is not applicable on each seal.

 

These are our prices offers, due to the higher volume of foam material and cutting work:

 

*	Position 1 / 05518: 2,00€/piece
*	Position 2 / 05519: 1,80€/piece
*	Position 3 / 05520: 0,40€/piece

 

Please clarify this topic internally and let me know if you’d like to proceed with this order.

 

Waiting your feedback, thank you.

 

Mit freundlichen Grüßen / Kind regards

 

Saad El Ouaamari

Drucktechnischer Berater / Print Technical Consultant

 

SDS Print Services GmbH
Kruppstr. 122
D-60388 Frankfurt


Tel:   +49 (0) 69 4080 29 7-5
Mobil/WhatsApp: +49 (0) 176 873 04 236

 

Von: info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it>  <info@mimii-lab.it <mailto:info@mimii-lab.it> > 
Gesendet: Dienstag, 29. Juli 2025 11:00
An: 'Saad El Ouaamari | SDS' <sa.el@sds-print.com <mailto:sa.el@sds-print.com> >; order@sds-print.com <mailto:order@sds-print.com> 
Betreff: ORDER N°71

 

Good morning,

please find attached our order n°71 as well as the drawings for each item in the order.

Blue Material / 27 Shore 

 

Kindly deliver this order with our previous, order n°70.

 

Let us know if you have any questions.

 

Thank you and best regards,

Laura
